================================ Forum for Government Tenders
================================
### Notification for Solicitation of Services
#### "Simultaneous Interpreters" 
[ID: CB-569-56804548, IDR: 24062-24-010]

**Tender Brief Details**
---------------

* **Publication Date**: May 7, 2024
* **Closing Date**: May 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET

**Scope of Work**
--------------

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBSC) invites bids for the provision of `Simultaneous Translation Services` for its events. This tender aims to fulfill the requirements of the TBSC for the provision of interpreters who can deliver simultaneous translation services in English and French.

**Contract Details**
-----------------

* **Contract Duration**: 3 years, from July 1, 2024 to March 31, 2028
* **Contract Location**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Bidding Requirements**
-----------------

* **Bidding Method**: Competitive, open bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
 

**Get in Touch**
-----------------

* **Contact Person**: Dawn Dormer, 343-542-8102 or dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca
* **Tenders Submission**: Submit bids to the link below:
  + [Download RFP Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37690/24062-24-010-rfp-english.pdf)
  + [Download RFP Document (Français)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37690/24062-24-010-rfp-french.pdf)  (the "Client") for the provision of interpreters who can deliver simultaneous translation services in English and French.

**Contract Management**
-----------------

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat will be responsible for managing the contract as per the agreed terms and conditions. 

**Contact the Buyer**
---------------------

Dawn Dormer
Email: dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca
Phone: 343-542-8102
**Note**: Please respond to this message if you would like to take part in this contract. **Thank you**  and I hope this rewritten content had helped !
